NEW VPS Cloud Hosting!
--------------------------------------------------

Take a step back, relax and calm down as this is going to be a remarkable offer that you cannot refuse.

Get ahead of the crowd with our latest LiteSpeed hosting service on the cloud with CloudLinux today for a great low price starting from $20.00/monthly.
(Litespeed and CloudLinux) Sold Separately!

All servers are un-managed without the use of cPanel, you can order cPanel for an additional $8.00 per month via the order form or add management for $30.00 and receive cPanel/WHM absolutely free with your new setup.

Features:-
- 24x7 Technical Support (Managed Orders)
- Installatron Installer (Available on Orders)
- Softaculous Installer (Available on Orders)
- LiteSpeed Enterprise (Available on Orders)
- WHMCS Billing (Available on Orders)
- Management (Available on orders)
